ARGUMENT
f

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_brric2 | |- ( R ~=r S <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ E. f f e. ( R RingIso S ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rimgim | |- ( f e. ( R RingIso S ) -> f e. ( R GrpIso S ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_brgici | |- ( f e. ( R GrpIso S ) -> R ~=g S ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( f e. ( R RingIso S ) -> R ~=g S ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_exlimiv | |- ( E. f f e. ( R RingIso S ) -> R ~=g S ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ E. f f e. ( R RingIso S ) ) -> R ~=g S ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_sylbi | |- ( R ~=r S -> R ~=g S ) |
